department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)", "Tendering Procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid",
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Title
__Air Handling Unit (AHU) Speed Drives Replacement, JAG Building, Summerside, PE__() 

#### Solicitation Number
ED001-221338/B

#### Tender Type
Request for Information

#### Trade Agreement
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Procurement Category
Construction Services

#### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Contract Security
Standard bid and contract security required

#### Tender Closing Date
2022-09-08 at 1:00 pm AST

#### Estimated Contract Value
$100,001 - $500,000 (HST included)

#### Request for Information

Public Works and Government Services Canada invites interested contractors to express their interest in supplying, installing, testing, adjusting, balancing, and commissioning of 12 new Variable Frequency Drives (VFDs) and necessary equipment for 5 existing Air Handling Units (AHUs) and 2 chilled water pumps. 

This tender is a two-phase process. In the first phase, interested contractors will provide basic contact information. The second phase will invite contractors to provide a financial bid based on the specifications and drawings.

#### Important Notice

*   This is a two-phase selection process. Contractors must submit their expressions of interest in the first phase.
*   Questions and inquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority, Timothee Beausoleil, at least five (5) business days before the closing date.
*   CanadaBuys is Public Services and Procurement Canada's (PSPC) new suite of procurement services. Please register your business on SAP Ariba, our electronic procurement solution, to prepare for the transition to CanadaBuys.

#### Contact Information

*   Contracting Authority: Timothee Beausoleil
*   Email: timothee.beausoleil2@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca
*   Phone: (902) 388-8377
*   Fax: (902) 566-7514

**Submission Instructions**

*   Interested contractors must complete the submission using the CPC Connect service.
*   The solicitation number must be identified in the CPC Connect message field of all electronic transfers.
*   Further instructions are available in the Request for Information document.

### Documents

*   [Tender Document (English)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/19/ab0288958b87
